title: Neon genesis Evangelion. Angelic days
creator: Hayashi, Fumino, author, illustrator
description: Harried, harassed and harangued--that's Shinji Ikari's life in a nutshell. Still, his days are fairly typical for a Tokyo teenager--he's got a pushy pal in Asuka who rudely rouses him whenever he's running late for school, and he's surrounded by the standard assortment of high school goofballs. In fact, everything's just as you'd expect--until one day when Shinji bumps into a strange girl he's never seen before, and she promptly accuses him of peeking up her skirt! But that's not the worst of it. Strange dreams have been haunting his sleep lately--dreams of a robotic "other" just beyond the horizon
Printed in the Japanese right-to-left format
"Based on an original story by Gainax, Khara"--Vol. 5
"Originally published in Japan in 2004 by Kadokawa Shoten Publishing"--Vol. 1, colophon
Based on the Japanese television series produced by Gainax and broadcast in 1995-1996 and the videogame, Neon Genesis Evangelion: Girlfriend of Steel 2nd
V. 1. Angelic days -- v. 2. Love is a battlefield -- v. 3. Love is in the air -- v. 4 Heartfelt confessions -- v.5 In the beginning -- v.6 The end of the road
